intro: Ultramarines Legion armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 14 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 4 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Legiones Astartes Detachments and Collegia Titanica Allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Legiones Cybernetica Maniples have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Machine Spirit' special rule. Solar Auxilia Allied Sections have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia Allied Lances have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.
armyRules: The Dauntless special rule applies to all Ultramarines Legion Detachments and Collegia Titanica Banners.

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Tactical Squads
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Replace two Tactical Legionaries with two Legion Support Squads (1 U/p), or two Legion Heavy Support Squads (2 U/p)
Add two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p) or two Cataphractii Terminator Squads (3 U/p)

formations.name: Mechanized Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Tactical Squads, two Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Praetor (0-1 in the army, 2 U/p)
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Support Rhino of any single configuration: 1 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raiders: 3 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any configuration: 3 U/p
